channel.title: The Complete List of Artificial Intelligence Terms And Their Definitions on Tech Terminologies
channel.description: Recent content in The Complete List of Artificial Intelligence Terms And Their Definitions on Tech Terminologies

item.title: What is MLOps (Machine Learning Operations)?
item.description: MLOps, short for Machine Learning Operations, refers to the set of practices, processes, and technologies used to manage the entire lifecycle of machine learning models.

item.title: What is Explainable Artificial Intelligence (XAI)?
item.description: At its core, Explainable AI (XAI) refers to the ability of an AI system to provide understandable explanations for its decision-making processes.

item.title: What is Hyperparameter?
item.description: In the realm of machine learning, the term “hyperparameter” refers to a crucial element that plays a vital role in the training process of an algorithm.
